Adversaries.Alerting_Strategy: Events that are deemed to be related to a suspicious or malicious behavior are assigned appropriate severity values (Suspicious, Low, Medium, High). These behaviors are also enriched with a short description, related events, and potential mapping(s) to related ATT&CK Tactics and Techniques. Tagged behaviors are aggregated into specific views when included as part of other views of system events/data.
Adversaries.Correlation_Strategy: Incident views highlight potentially associated suspicious or malicious behaviors in an environment. Each detection includes one or more hosts, and the data may include alerts triggered, investigation status, remediation steps, process information, ATT&CK information, etc.. Report views are also available to provide users a search capability to examine the relationships between alerts, endpoints, and other data.
